Events that occurred on 15 July.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1883 - Inkling Adam Fox is born.
1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien becomes a second lieutenant, and is appointed to the 13th Service Battalion of the Lancashire Fusiliers.
1919 - Tolkien is officially released from service, well over a year after the war's end.
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 165b.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien sends a letter to Miss J.L. Curry.
1979 - Mythcon 10 in San Jose, California.
1998 - Mythcon 29 in Wheaton, Illinois.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony in Seattle.
2004 - Tolkien Thing VI in Hohensolms, Hohenahr, Germany.
2006 - Tolkien Thing VIII in Diez, Germany.
2007 - Tolkien Thing IX in Diez, Germany.
2010 - Tolkien Thing 2010 in Bad Hersfeld, Germany.
2011 - Tolkien Thing 2011 in Breuberg, Germany.
2011 - Mythcon 42 in Albuquerque, New Mexico.
2013 - Mythcon 44 at Michigan State University, East Lansing.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
